javaBackendDev.name: Java Backend Dev
techStack: Spring Framework / Spring Boot / Spring Cloud
Data Structures / Algorithms / Functional Programming / Design Patterns
MongoDB / Redis / MySQL / Cache / ElasticSearch / ELK
Maven / Git / GitHub / GitLab / Travis CI
Linux / Alibaba Cloud / AWS / Nginx / Docker / DockerHub / Kubernetes
coreCompetence: Ability of and experience in constructing product-feature implementations, fast and efficiently.
Good coding style.
Advocate of Functional-Programing and Test-Driven-Development.
Experience in tracing and customizing open-source frameworks.
Experience in troubleshooting subtle bugs.
Experience in developing high-concurrency services and optimizing performance.
Lots of experience in integrating third-party platform services.

webFrontendDev.name: Web Frontend Dev
coreCompetence: Good Javascript basics.
Mastery of the mechanism and core components within React framework.
Good coding style.
Pursuing friendly, concise and beautiful frontend design.

architectureAndDesign.name: Software Architecture & Design

favoriteResources.name: Domain-Driven Design
favoriteResources.subName: tackling complexity in the heart of software

coreCompetence: Familiar with core capabilities and components of Spring Cloud.
Familiar with Microservices architecture and related patterns.
Proficient in using UML to express architectural design.
Extensive experience in defining RESTful APIs with Swagger.
Experience in constructing business middle platform based on Microservices architecture.
Experience in building system infrastructures based on Microservices architecture.

solutionBuilding.name: Software Solution Building

favoriteResources.name: Essential Scrum
favoriteResources.subName: a practical guide to the most popular agile process

coreCompetence: Appreciating iterative and incremental building processes.
Experience in analyzing customer requirements on-site.
Experience in competitive product analysis and technology selection.
Experience in balancing team capabilities, product form(Web/mini-program/App), buying/building, cost, operational goals and other factors to form a feasible solution.
Practice of operational-feedback-driven product iteration.
Experience in opening capabilities to and integrating with third parties such as Yuanfudao, TAL.

Be aware of the ITIL Framework.
Experience in controlling product development process.

techTeamManagement.name: Technical Team Management

favoriteResources.name: Essential Scrum
favoriteResources.subName: a practical guide to the most popular agile process

coreCompetence: Familiar with the various roles involved in the software lifecycle and typical process frameworks.
Full sense of cooperation.
Experience in planning, recruitment, development, evaluation and optimization related to technical team building.
Familiar with KPI, OKR management frameworks.

slogans: Humility is the solid foundation of all virtues.
Testing is not the point. The point is responsibility.
Iterative development acknowledges that we will probably get things wrong before we get them right and that we will do things poorly before we do them well.
Incremental development is based on the age-old principle of "Build some of it before you build all of it."
When lost in the woods, if the map doesn’t agree with the terrain, in all cases believe the terrain.
"I believe that this nation should commit itself to achieving the goal, before this decade is out, of landing a man on the Moon and returning him safely to the Earth" (Kennedy 1961)
